## Ray.(constructor)

Construct a ray from origin and normalized direction vector.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(origin?: Vector3, directionNormalized?: Vector3);
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description

origin


</td><td>

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The ray origin if not specified, zero vector will be used.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

directionNormalized


</td><td>

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The normalized direction vector. if not specified, (0, 0, 1) will be used.


</td></tr>
